channel.title: React Native on Chiamaka's blog
channel.description: Recent content in React Native on Chiamaka's blog

item.title: I'm Creating An OSS Shopping Cart Component. Wanna Join In?
item.description: So some time back I was roaming on the FB react-native community (if you don’t know that, click here) and I saw someone asking if there was a component like this and he posted up a photo of what he needed. I didn’t know if there was one but I had the idea that maybe I could build one. So hear me out. I’m hoping that maybe, just maybe, someone would be willing to work on this with me to make it a really helpful component.
